title: Corrosive Flail
content:
Corrosive Flail Rare 2~9 Damage 1d8 +1 Bludgeoning Corrosive Strike: Deal additional Acid damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus. On a hit, create a pool of acid around the target which reduces Armour Class by 2. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Acid was long ago abandoned by assassins, who found poison much more reliable in spiking their targets' drinks. The acid kept melting the chalices. Flail 0.9 310

1d8 +1 Bludgeoning

Corrosive Strike: Deal additional Acid
